org.smartfrog.services.dns
Interface DNSServiceInstance

All Known Implementing Classes:
DNSServiceInstanceImpl
public interface DNSServiceInstance

A "bean like" interface to a service instance.

Method Summary
 org.smartfrog.sfcore.componentdescription.ComponentDescription getDescription()
          Gets a set of attribute/ value pairs that describe this instance.

          Gets the IP address where the service is running.

          Gets the host name where the service is running.

          Gets the port number where the service is running.
 int getPriority()
          Gets the priority associated to this instance (lower better).

          Gets a random weight associated with this service (proportional to the actual weight).

          Gets the name of the service.

          Gets the weight associated to this instance.

          Gets the maximum range for weights associated to a common priority.

          Initializes a random weight proportional to the weight and relative to a range.

          Sets the maximum range for weights associated to a common priority.
 

Method Detail

getServiceName

java.lang.String getServiceName()
Gets the name of the service.

Returns:

getHostName

java.lang.String getHostName()
Gets the host name where the service is running.

Returns:
The host name where the service is running.

getHostAddress

java.net.InetAddress getHostAddress()
Gets the IP address where the service is running. This is useful when a "conventional" DNS look-up will not provide it.

Returns:
An IP address where the service is running.

getPort

int getPort()
Gets the port number where the service is running.

Returns:
the port number where the service is running.

getWeight

int getWeight()
Gets the weight associated to this instance. A proportional random factor for equal priority selection (0-65535). (see DNS-SD RFC)

Returns:
the weight associated to this instance.

getPriority

int getPriority()
Gets the priority associated to this instance (lower better). (see DNS-SD RFC)

Returns:
The priority associated to this instance (lower better).

getDescription

org.smartfrog.sfcore.componentdescription.ComponentDescription getDescription()
Gets a set of attribute/ value pairs that describe this instance.

Returns:
a set of attribute/ value pairs that describe this instance.

getWeightRange

int getWeightRange()
Gets the maximum range for weights associated to a common priority.

Returns:
The maximum range for weights associated to a common priority.

setWeightRange

int setWeightRange(int weightRange)
Sets the maximum range for weights associated to a common priority.

Parameters:
weightRange - the maximum range for weights associated to a common priority.
Returns:
The old value for the weight range.

getRandomWeight

float getRandomWeight()
Gets a random weight associated with this service (proportional to the actual weight).

Returns:
A random weight associated with this service (proportional to the actual weight).

resetRandomWeight

void resetRandomWeight()
Initializes a random weight proportional to the weight and relative to a range.
